summary.para: The OCSP_SIGNED_REQUEST_INFO structure contains information for an online certificate status protocol (OCSP) request with optional signature information.

remarks.para: In an OCSP client application, this structure receives an encoded structure as its ToBeSigned member. Optionally, a signature of the ToBeSigned member is stored in the pOptionalSignatureInfo member.

On the receiving end, an OCSP responder application decodes the incoming request to populate an OCSP_SIGNED_REQUEST_INFO structure and subsequently decodes the ToBeSigned member to obtain an structure.
OCSP applications can encode or decode this structure by using X509_ASN_ENCODING or PKCS_7_ASN_ENCODING.

summary.para: A BLOB that has been encoded by using Distinguished Encoding Rules (DER) and that contains the OCSP request information.
A pointer to an structure that contains optional signature information.
